languages.text: В трагических событиях, сопровождавших возвращение Мессии Прерывания Цикла, многие члены конклава флота погибли. Иерархическая цепь вознесла Магоса Доминуса Оптикона-22 в круг высших руководителей. Он пробыл в нем более столетия, пока не был низложен и утилизирован по обвинению в попытке возрождения проклятой схизмы.

Many members of the conclave perished during the tragic events that accompanied the return of the Messiah of Discontinuing the Cycle. The hierarchical chain raised Magos Dominus Opticon-22 to the highest circle of leadership. He remained there for more than a century until he was deposed and disposed of, charged with attempting to revive the anathematised schism.
languages.original_text: В трагических событиях, сопровождавших возвращение Мессии Прерывания Цикла, многие члены конклава флота погибли. Иерархическая цепь вознесла Магоса Доминуса Оптикона-22 в круг высших руководителей. Он пробыл в нем более столетия, пока не был низложен и утилизирован по обвинению в попытке возрождения проклятой схизмы.

traits.locale_text: Many members of the conclave perished during the tragic events that accompanied the return of the Messiah of Discontinuing the Cycle. The hierarchical chain lifted the Magos Dominius Opticon-22 into the circle of the upper leadership. He remained there for more than a century until he was deposed and disposed of, due to accusations of attempting to revive the anathematized schism.

He remained there for more than a century until he was deposed and disposed of, due to accusations of attempting to revive the anathematized schism.

The hierarchical chain lifted Magos Dominus Opticon-22 to highest circle of leadership. He remained there for more than a century until he was deposed and disposed of, accused of attempting to revive the anathematized schism.

The hierarchical chain lifted Magos Dominus Opticon-22 to highest circle of leadership. He remained there for more than a century until he was deposed and disposed of, accused of attempting to revive the anathematized schism.

The hierarchical chain raised Magos Dominus Opticon-22 to the highest circle of leadership. He remained there for more than a century until he was deposed and disposed of, charged with attempting to revive the anathematised schism.

Many members of the conclave perished during the tragic events that accompanied the return of the Messiah of Discontinuing the Cycle. The hierarchical chain raised Magos Dominus Opticon-22 to the highest circle of leadership. He remained there for more than a century until he was deposed and disposed of, charged with attempting to revive the anathematised schism.

languages.text: 弥赛亚回归时引发的悲惨事件，导致秘会的众多成员不幸丧生。指挥链发成变动，统御贤者奥普蒂孔22号也成为了最高领导层成员之一。他担任这个职位长达一百多年，在此之后，他被指控试图重振可憎的分裂思潮，遭到了废黜、处决。
languages.original_text: Many members of the conclave perished during the tragic events that accompanied the return of the Messiah of Discontinuing the Cycle. The hierarchical chain raised Magos Dominus Opticon-22 to the highest circle of leadership. He remained there for more than a century until he was deposed and disposed of, charged with attempting to revive the anathematised schism.

traits.locale_text: 弥赛亚回归时引发的悲惨事件，导致秘会的众多成员不幸丧生。指挥链发成变动，统御贤者奥普蒂孔22号也成为了最高领导层成员之一。他担任这个职位长达一百多年，在此之后，他被指控试图重振可憎的分裂思潮，遭到了废黜、处决。

languages.text: Während der tragischen Ereignisse rund um die Rückkehr des Messias der Unterbrechung des Zyklus ließen viele Mitglieder der Konklave ihr Leben. Die Hierarchie erhob Magos Dominus Opticon-22 in den höchsten Kreis der Führung. Dort blieb er über ein Jahrhundert lang, bis er abgesetzt und entsorgt wurde, weil man ihm vorwarf, das anathematische Schisma wiederbeleben zu wollen.
languages.original_text: Many members of the conclave perished during the tragic events that accompanied the return of the Messiah of Discontinuing the Cycle. The hierarchical chain raised Magos Dominus Opticon-22 to the highest circle of leadership. He remained there for more than a century until he was deposed and disposed of, charged with attempting to revive the anathematised schism.

traits.locale_text: Während der tragischen Ereignisse rund um die Rückkehr des Messias der Unterbrechung des Zyklus ließen viele Mitglieder der Konklave ihr Leben. Die Hierarchie erhob Magos Dominus Opticon-22 in den höchsten Kreis der Führung. Dort blieb er über ein Jahrhundert lang, bis er abgesetzt und entsorgt wurde, weil man ihm vorwarf das anathematische Schisma wiederbeleben zu wollen.

languages.text: De nombreux membres du conclave périrent lors des tragiques événements provoqués par le retour du Messie de l'Interruption du Cycle. Les différents mouvements au sein de la hiérarchie hissèrent le magos dominus Opticon-22 dans les plus hautes sphères décisionnaires. Il resta en position de force durant plus d'un siècle avant d'être accusé de tenter de raviver le schisme anathème. Il fut alors destitué et détruit.
languages.original_text: Many members of the conclave perished during the tragic events that accompanied the return of the Messiah of Discontinuing the Cycle. The hierarchical chain raised Magos Dominus Opticon-22 to the highest circle of leadership. He remained there for more than a century until he was deposed and disposed of, charged with attempting to revive the anathematised schism.

traits.locale_text: De nombreux membres du conclave périrent lors des tragiques événements provoqués par le retour du Messie de l'Interruption du Cycle. Les différents mouvements au sein de la hiérarchie hissèrent le magos dominus Opticon-22 dans les plus hautes sphères décisionnaires. Il resta en position de force durant plus d'un siècle avant d'être accusé de tenter de raviver le schisme anathème. Il fut alors destitué et détruit.

languages.text: Muchos miembros del cónclave perdieron la vida durante los trágicos eventos que siguieron al regreso del Mesías de la Discontinuidad del Ciclo. La cadena jerárquica elevó al Magos Dominus Opticon-22 a la esfera más alta del liderazgo. Permaneció en el puesto durante más de un siglo, hasta que fue depuesto y eliminado, acusado de tratar de revivir el cisma anatematizado.
languages.original_text: Many members of the conclave perished during the tragic events that accompanied the return of the Messiah of Discontinuing the Cycle. The hierarchical chain raised Magos Dominus Opticon-22 to the highest circle of leadership. He remained there for more than a century until he was deposed and disposed of, charged with attempting to revive the anathematised schism.

traits.locale_text: Muchos miembros del cónclave perdieron la vida durante los trágicos eventos que siguieron al regreso del Mesías de la Discontinuidad del Ciclo. La cadena jerárquica elevó al magos Dominus Opticon-22 a las esferas más altas de liderazgo. Permaneció en el puesto durante más de un siglo, hasta que fue depuesto y eliminado, acusado de tratar de revivir el cisma anatematizado.

languages.text: 円環を断ち切る救世主の帰還に伴う悲劇的な出来事の間に、ス評議会の多くのメンバーが亡くなった。階層的な連鎖により、マゴス・ドミヌス・オプティコン-22は最高指導者の座に就いた。彼はその地位に1世紀以上とどまっていたが、破門された分派を復活させようとした罪に問われ、退位ののちに処分されることとなった。
languages.original_text: Many members of the conclave perished during the tragic events that accompanied the return of the Messiah of Discontinuing the Cycle. The hierarchical chain raised Magos Dominus Opticon-22 to the highest circle of leadership. He remained there for more than a century until he was deposed and disposed of, charged with attempting to revive the anathematised schism.

traits.locale_text: 円環を断ち切る救世主の帰還に伴う悲劇的な出来事の間に、ス評議会の多くのメンバーが亡くなった。階層的な連鎖により、マゴス・ドミヌス・オプティコン-22は最高指導者の座に就いた。彼はその地位に1世紀以上とどまっていたが、破門された分派を復活させようとした罪に問われ、退位ののちに処分されることとなった。

languages.text: Döngü Süreğinin Bozulumu Mesihi'nin dönüşünün sebep olduğu trajik olaylar sırasında birçok meclis mensubu ortadan kayboldu. Hiyerarşik zincir, Magos Dominus Opticon-22'yi üst düzey önderler arasına soktu. Yeni mevkisinde yüzyıldan uzun süre hizmet verdi, ardından yanlış ilan edilen bir anlayışı geri getirme teşebbüsüyle suçlanarak görevden alındı ve ortadan kaldırıldı.
languages.original_text: Many members of the conclave perished during the tragic events that accompanied the return of the Messiah of Discontinuing the Cycle. The hierarchical chain raised Magos Dominus Opticon-22 to the highest circle of leadership. He remained there for more than a century until he was deposed and disposed of, charged with attempting to revive the anathematised schism.

traits.locale_text: Devamsızlık Mesihi'nin dönüşünün sebep olduğu trajik olaylar sırasında birçok meclis üyesi ortadan kayboldu. Hiyerarşik zincir, Magos Dominus Opticon-22'yi en üst düzey liderlerin arasına soktu. O mevkide yüzyıldan fazla süre hizmet verdi, ardından yanlış ilan edilen bir anlayışı geri getirme teşebbüsüyle suçlanarak görevden alındı ve ortadan kaldırıldı.
